/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a natural canopy over the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the bustling activity of daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene, enhancing the colors and details of the image.
